item.title: Upgrading My Kubernetes Cluster
item.description: Rough guide to upgrading k8s cluster with kubeadm Disclaimer: This is not the best way, just a way that works for me given the cluster topography I have (which was installed using kubeadm on ubuntu, and includes a non-HA etcd running in-cluster). On the control plane / master node Backup etcd (manually) You might need the info from the etcd pod (kubectl -n kube-system describe po etcd-master) to find the various certs/keys/etc, but they’re probably at /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/
